lead_paragraph: The former Kentucky linebacker Wilbur Hackett Jr.’s latest hit may be his most popular of all. Hackett, a Southeastern Conference official, was the umpire in Saturday night’s L.S.U.-South Carolina game and became an instant Internet sensation for his shoulder-first shot on Gamecocks quarterback Stephen Garcia.
